siteDescription: Welcome to Guwahati SDA Church, a community where you can grow in faith and make a difference
siteKeywords: Guwahati, SDA, Church, Community, Faith, Difference, Seventh-day Adventist, Adventist, Christian, Religion, Bible, Jesus, God, Love, Hope, Future, Jeremiah 29:11
aboutChurch: Guwahati SDA Church is a community of faith and love. Our mission is to share the love of our Father. Join us and make a difference.

hero.description: Welcome to our community where you can grow in faith and make a difference.
hero.scripture1: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future. - Jeremiah 29:11
hero.scripture2: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life. - John 3:16
